name: Memory Trainer Brain Challenge - Intellect Mind Experiment
name_original: Memory Trainer Brain Challenge - Intellect Mind Experiment
description:
Push your brain to the limits! Are you able to reach the final stage?

This game is all about training and keeping your brain in shape. Numbers show up for a short amount of time, and they will be covered soon. You have to tap the covering sheets in the right order. It doesn't stop there, since on different levels you get different amount of numbers and by the final stages some numbers will be missing.

You recieve your score depending on how quick you were able to recall the right order, and how far you got. Your scores are submitted to an online leaderboard where you can compare your score to how others performed.

This game was based on a real-life experiment. Playing this game will improve your memory noticably after playing only a couple of minutes. For better result, please try to concentrate only on the game, separated from possible distracting factors.
